thirdPartyIntegration.tip.scriptModifies: This script modifies some interactive behaviors of the target website. You can manually enable or disable the script in Tampermonkey.
thirdPartyIntegration.tip.soulPlusClick: Left-clicking on covers or post titles will trigger the creation of a post parsing task on Bakabase. You can still use the middle button to open posts.
thirdPartyIntegration.tip.exHentaiClick: Left-clicking on covers will trigger the creation of a torrent download task on Bakabase. You can still use the middle button to open posts.
